duties_responsibilities.duty: Lead teams to deliver project(s) across one or more business units, managing resources, schedules, contracts, field personnel, and job costing.
Contribute to process improvement initiatives and manage issues, risks, and project change requests to ensure successful and on-time project delivery.
Verify that the project produces the required deliverable of quality, within the specified constraints of time and cost, and achieve the potential benefits defined in the business case.
Provide leadership for project team ensuring team members are meeting project goals and adhering to their responsibilities.
Procure adequate resources to achieve project objectives in planned time frames and manage the day-to-day project activities.
Assist in dispute, negotiation, arbitration or litigation, as needed, and ensure that projects and programs are proceeding according to scope, schedule, budget and quality standards.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree in Project Management, Business, or a related field (Master's preferred)
